question.title: What is a possible cause of early puberty?
question.description: Select the correct etiological framework for early puberty.

option_a.title: Genetic mutation
option_a.description: A genetic mutation can cause early puberty.

option_b.title: Hormonal imbalance due to adrenal gland disorder
option_b.description: A disorder of the adrenal gland can lead to hormonal imbalance and early puberty.

option_c.title: Environmental toxin exposure
option_c.description: Exposure to certain environmental toxins can stimulate the onset of puberty.

option_d.title: Infection with a virus that affects the hypothalamus
option_d.description: A viral infection can cause inflammation of the hypothalamus, leading to early puberty.
